What motivates you is probably not your passion.

Passion is not the true motivation of oneâ€™s life.

Passion is the result of continuously doing what you want or love to do.

It is the result of your drive and motivation.

The answer to what drives and motivates you is more important than finding what you are passionate about.

You probably already know what you want or love to do. But didnâ€™t have the courage to do it.Find the drive and motivation of your life, not passion.
